fe310.description: The FE310-G000 is the first Freedom E300 SoC, and is the industry's first commercially available RISC-V SoC. The FE310-G000 is built around the E31 Core Complex instantiated in the Freedom E300 platform.

msip.description: MSIP (Machine-mode Software Interrupts) Register per Hart

mtimecmp.description: Machine Time Compare Registers per Hart

value.description: The priority for a given global interrupt

wdog.description: Watchdog Timer (WDT), part of Always-On Domain

rtc.description: Real-Time Clock (RTC), part of Always-On Domain

pmu.description: Power-Management Unit (PMU), part of Always-On Domain

lfrosccfg.description: Internal Programmable Low-Frequency Ring Oscillator Register

hfrosccfg.description: Internal Trimmable Programmable 72 MHz Oscillator Register

pllr-enum.description: Reference Clock R Divide Ratio Enumeration

pllf-enum.description: Reference Clock F Multiplier Ratio Enumeration

pllq-enum.description: Reference Clock Q Divide Ratio Enumeration

bit.description: HW I/O Function Enable Bit Field
HW I/O Function Select Bit Field

0.description: Assert/de-assert CS at the beginning/end of each frame

2.description: Keep CS continuously asserted after the initial frame

3.description: Disable hardware control of the CS pin

0.description: For dual and quad protocols, the DQ pins are tri-stated. For the single protocol, the DQ0 pin is driven with the transmit data as normal.

1.description: The receive FIFO is not populated.

addrproto.description: Protocol for transmitting address and padding

padcode.description: First 8 bits to transmit during dummy cycles

zerocmp.description: Zero - counter resets to zero after match

deglitch.description: Deglitch - latch pwmcmpXip within same cycle

enoneshot.description: enable one shot - run one cycle

zerocmp.description: Zero - counter resets to zero after match

deglitch.description: Deglitch - latch pwmcmpXip within same cycle

enoneshot.description: enable one shot - run one cycle
